title: Las Vegas Sheriff Joseph Lombardo To Appear on The Ed Bernstein Show
text:
LAS VEGAS - This week on The Ed Bernstein Show Las Vegas personal injury lawyer Ed Bernstein will interview Sheriff Joseph Lombardo of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department.
Sheriff Lombardo will be discussing all of the hot topics facing police officers this year and what that means for the public.
He’ll discuss national problems that all police officers have been facing including the increase of crime during the recession and increased gang activity as well as local Las Vegas problems including sharing his thoughts on how the new medical marijuana dispensaries that are opening up will affect public safety.
One of the things Sheriff Lombardo will also discuss is how the rise of social media has been affecting law enforcement. He’ll discuss how social media threats are going to be handled by law enforcement and how social media is factoring into police investigations.
Lastly, he’ll share some tips for what you should do if you’re every pulled over by the police and his opinion on requiring police to wear body cameras.
Tune in this Sunday at 3:00 p.m. to watch Sheriff Joseph Lombardo on The Ed Bernstein Show!
